h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Instead, use your Immobilize spell to lock them down and try attacking from behind, and watch out for their head slamming attacks.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm'.
The content is as follows:
Instead, use your Immobilize spell to lock them down and try attacking from behind, and watch out for their head slamming attacks.
